Hello there

My name is João!

I am an iOS Developer, student of all things interesting, and part time addon developer for a litlte known game called World of Warcraft.

In this page you can find everything I'm working on, from iOS apps, to WoW addons, and sometimes useful posts about workflow automation!

Some skills and achievements I’m proud of:

  • I’m well versed in UIKit and SwiftUI alike;
  • I have integrated apps with CoreData and CloudKit;
  • I have worked in over 15 apps in the last 5 years;
  • I achieved KSM in every seasons of WoW since 2019;
